name: CakePhp2 Component Mailchimp Api
body:
### Welcome to CakePhp 2 Component Mailchimp Api.
The solution from Mailchimp api, in CakePhp:


### Installation
1.Add archive in components folder: app/controller/components from cakePhp.
2.Call the controller: 
```php
var $components=array( 'Mailchimp');
```

3.Create function, use the component (For exemple lists)
```php
$this->Mailchimp->MCAPI("API_KEY");
$list = $this->Mailchimp->lists();
```
### Authors and Contributors
In 2012, deldan (@bonzzaydan)

### Support or Contact
deldan (@bonzzaydan)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
